metadata.name: Whisper Your Wish
metadata.description:
Whisper Your Wish, is a special illustration collaboration with super talented Thai NFT artists, 2ongs (@2ongsdrawing). This NFT illustration is based on the special airdrop NFT made for collectors of all four seasons of WMFG (https://opensea.io/collection/wmfg4seasons). Since it is the end of 2022 and the beginning of a new year and start, 2023, I wanted to share this beautiful illustration with WMFG fam and collectors. 

Have you ever tossed a coin into a fountain or a lake? In the region where I am based, Asia, there is a lot of myths and wishes related to throwing a coin into the water. It has been said and believed that the act of tossing a coin is similar to sending up a prayer to god —an early version of making a wish. Since water was a scarce resource back in ancient history, that is how ancestors prayed for drinkable water. Now more or less this practice represents as saying your wish.

Carp also has a symbolic meaning in Asia. Fish drawn in Asian art(Japan/China/Korea) is mostly the carp. This fish symbolizes longevity because carps can get very old and the big scales on the body of a carp represents the skin of a dragon (dragon is similar to the mythical animal, the unicorn, in the West). In Asian cultures, fish stands for fertility – some sources say it is because of the huge amount of offspring most fish have.

We all have wish inside our hearts. I hope your wish comes true and that this Special Edition is a lucky charm in your wallet. Whisper your wish to this NFT and it will come true...!

May your wish come true... in the year 2023 special ones!
